item.title: Sneak peak intreaba.net (#RoR, #elasticsearch)
item.description: A new simplified way of adding a question and getting answers. First project will be launch only in romanian and will be build with #RoR, will have facebook authentification, #elasticsearch autocomplete, #bootstrap responsive theme.
